title: The Lord of the Rings
description: An epic journey through Middle-earth where hobbits, elves, and men unite to destroy the One Ring and defeat the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: A Game of Thrones
description: The first book in the 'A Song of Ice and Fire' series, featuring noble families vying for power in a medieval fantasy world filled with intrigue and dragons.

title: The Name of the Wind
description: The story of Kvothe, a magically gifted young man, as he grows from a gifted child to a legendary figure in the world of Temerant.

title: Mistborn: The Final Empire
description: In a world ruled by a Dark Lord, a group of rebels with magical abilities attempt to overthrow the oppressive Lord Ruler.

title: The Wheel of Time: The Eye of the World
description: The beginning of a sprawling epic where young villagers are thrust into a struggle between the forces of Light and Shadow.

title: The Way of Kings
description: An epic tale of war, politics, and magic set in the storm-ravaged world of Roshar, following multiple characters whose destinies intertwine.

title: The Hobbit
description: Bilbo Baggins embarks on an unexpected adventure with dwarves to reclaim treasure from the dragon Smaug.

title: The Silver Citadel
description: A humble blacksmith discovers a sword that awakens an ancient citadel ruled by sentient metal guardians who demand a new king.

title: Thornborn
description: A young noble cursed to sprout thorns from her skin must track down the forest god who doomed her bloodline.

title: Ashes of the First Dragon
description: The skeleton of the world's first dragon is unearthed, and kingdoms race to harness the power trapped in its molten heart.

title: Mooncarver
description: A thief who steals moonlight discovers she can bend time, attracting the attention of celestial beings who want her dead.

title: The Library of Fallen Names
description: Every human name ever erased from history is stored in a forbidden library, and one boy finds his own name there.

title: Stormfeather
description: A warrior who rides lightning-forged birds must defend her homeland from storm spirits seeking revenge.

title: The Bone Harps
description: Music crafted from enchanted bones summons the dead, and a bard accidentally awakens an army bound to her voice.

title: Blood of the Winter King
description: The tyrant king frozen in ice begins to thaw as winter spreads unnaturally across the realm.

title: Gilded Serpent
description: A guild of alchemists hunts a mythical serpent whose golden scales can rewrite reality.

title: The Lantern of Echo Vale
description: A magical lantern reveals the future to its holder, but each glimpse shortens their life.

title: Crown of Morrowind
description: A prince wakes up with no memory and a crown fused to his skull that whispers commands in a forgotten language.

title: The Warden of Hollowfen
description: A forest spirit chooses a reluctant teenager as its champion against encroaching mechanical gods.

title: Feathers of Fire
description: Phoenix riders are losing control of their flames, suggesting the mythical bird of creation has died.

title: The Sorcerer's Debt
description: A sorcerer who borrowed magic from demons must repay his debt with the lives of those he loves.

title: The Broken Rune
description: A runestone cracks, releasing spells that alter reality at random and plunge the world into chaos.

title: Riversong
description: A girl learns rivers are alive and demand tribute—or cities built on their shores will drown overnight.

title: Glassborn
description: Children born with glass bones wield powerful magic, but every spell pushes them closer to shattering.

title: The Dreamforger
description: An artisan forges weapons out of dreams, unaware a nightmare entity is using him to invade reality.

title: The Ember Oath
description: A girl bound by a fiery oath can never speak a lie—if she does, the fire consumes her soul.

title: The Last Griffin Keeper
description: A stable boy becomes guardian of the last griffin egg, hunted by all who fear the creature’s return.
